feed.title: BCD-watch: Changes Report (weekly)
feed.subtitle: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Jan 12 2026
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 5 January 2026 through Monday, 12 January 2026ğŸ”—

Browser Support Changes: +6, -0

Support increases (6)

API

  1. api â Navigation â currententrychange_event
    Added to Safari  â  3 of 3 engines
  2. api â Navigation â navigate_event
    Added to Safari  â  3 of 3 engines
  3. api â Navigation â navigateerror_event
    Added to Safari  â  3 of 3 engines
  4. api â Navigation â navigatesuccess_event
    Added to Safari  â  3 of 3 engines
  5. api â PointerEvent â pointerType â fractional_coordinates
    Added to Safari  â  3 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css â properties â font-family â math
    Added to Safari  â  3 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 24

Show all 24 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (5)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Wednesday, 17 December 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

JAVASCRIPT

  1. javascript â builtins â Intl â Locale â variants
    Backfilled for Safari  â  2 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css â types â color â color â colorSpace_parameter_accepts_display-p3-linear_value
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  3 of 3 engines

HTTP

  1. http â headers â Accept-CH â Sec-CH-Width
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines

WEBEXTENSIONS

  1. webextensions â api â proxy â ProxyInfo â masqueTemplate
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  1 of 3 engines
  2. webextensions â api â proxy â ProxyInfo â type
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  1 of 3 engines

New entries (19)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Wednesday, 17 December 2025, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (â€œRemoved BCD entriesâ€) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

CSS

  1. css â types â color â color â colorSpace_parameter_accepts_display-p3-linear_value

HTML

  1. html â elements â meta â name â viewport
  2. html â elements â meta â name â viewport â height
  3. html â elements â meta â name â viewport â initial-scale
  4. html â elements â meta â name â viewport â interactive-widget
  5. html â elements â meta â name â viewport â interactive-widget â overlays-content
  6. html â elements â meta â name â viewport â interactive-widget â resizes-content
  7. html â elements â meta â name â viewport â interactive-widget â resizes-visual
  8. html â elements â meta â name â viewport â maximum-scale
  9. html â elements â meta â name â viewport â minimum-scale
  10. html â elements â meta â name â viewport â user-scalable
  11. html â elements â meta â name â viewport â viewport-fit
  12. html â elements â meta â name â viewport â viewport-fit â auto
  13. html â elements â meta â name â viewport â viewport-fit â cover
  14. html â elements â meta â name â viewport â width

HTTP

  1. http â headers â Accept-CH â Sec-CH-Width
  2. http â headers â Sec-CH-Width

WEBEXTENSIONS

  1. webextensions â api â proxy â ProxyInfo â masqueTemplate
  2. webextensions â api â proxy â ProxyInfo â type

Removed entries (0)

No features were removed from bcd in this time period
  • Previous report: Monday, 5 January 2026

BCD Watch: A service of

Subscribe: RSS â€¢Â Atom â€¢Â JSON

This report was generated by diffing v7.2.2 (Wednesday, 17 December 2025) and v7.2.3 (Tuesday, 6 January 2026)

entry.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Dec 22 2025
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 15 December 2025 through Monday, 22 December 2025ğŸ”—

Browser Support Changes: +15, -0

Support increases (15)

API

  1. api â LargestContentfulPaint â renderTime â cross-origin
    Added to Safari  â  3 of 3 engines
  2. api â Request â destination â speculationrules
    Added to Safari  â  2 of 3 engines

HTML

  1. html â elements â script â type â speculationrules
    Added to Safari  â  1 of 3 engines
  2. html â elements â script â type â speculationrules â eagerness
    Added to Safari  â  2 of 3 engines
  3. html â elements â script â type â speculationrules â prefetch
    Added to Safari  â  2 of 3 engines
  4. html â elements â script â type â speculationrules â referrer_policy
    Added to Safari  â  2 of 3 engines
  5. html â elements â script â type â speculationrules â relative_to
    Added to Safari  â  2 of 3 engines
  6. html â elements â script â type â speculationrules â source_optional
    Added to Safari  â  2 of 3 engines
  7. html â elements â script â type â speculationrules â tag
    Added to Safari  â  2 of 3 engines
  8. html â elements â script â type â speculationrules â urls
    Added to Safari  â  2 of 3 engines
  9. html â elements â script â type â speculationrules â where
    Added to Safari  â  2 of 3 engines

HTTP

  1. http â headers â Content-Security-Policy â script-src â inline-speculation-rules
    Added to Safari  â  2 of 3 engines
  2. http â headers â Sec-Purpose â speculationrules
    Added to Safari  â  2 of 3 engines
  3. http â headers â Sec-Speculation-Tags
    Added to Safari  â  2 of 3 engines
  4. http â headers â Speculation-Rules
    Added to Safari  â  2 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 31

Show all 31 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (21)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 12 December 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

API

  1. api â LargestContentfulPaint â paintTime
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  3 of 3 engines
  2. api â LargestContentfulPaint â presentationTime
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  3 of 3 engines
  3. api â CredentialsContainer â get â identity_option â providers_option_nonce
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css â types â attr â type_function â ident
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines
  2. css â types â attr â type_function â image
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines
  3. css â types â attr â type_function â length-percentage
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines
  4. css â types â attr â type_function â resolution
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines
  5. css â types â attr â type_function â transform-function
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines
  6. css â types â progress
    Backfilled for Safari  â  2 of 3 engines

WEBEXTENSIONS

  1. webextensions â api â webNavigation â onCommitted â parentFrameId
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines
  2. webextensions â api â webNavigation â onCompleted â parentFrameId
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines
  3. webextensions â api â webNavigation â onDOMContentLoaded â parentFrameId
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines
  4. webextensions â api â webNavigation â onErrorOccurred â parentFrameId
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines
  5. webextensions â api â webNavigation â onHistoryStateUpdated â parentFrameId
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines
  6. webextensions â api â webNavigation â onReferenceFragmentUpdated â parentFrameId
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines

HTML

  1. html â elements â details â search_match_opens
    Backfilled for Firefox  â  3 of 3 engines

HTTP

  1. http â headers â Accept-CH â Sec-CH-DPR
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines
  2. http â headers â Accept-CH â Sec-CH-Device-Memory
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines
  3. http â headers â Accept-CH â Sec-CH-Viewport-Height
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines
  4. http â headers â Accept-CH â Sec-CH-Viewport-Width
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines
  5. http â headers â Sec-CH-Viewport-Height
    Backfilled for Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines

New entries (10)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Friday, 12 December 2025, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (â€œRemoved BCD entriesâ€) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

API

  1. api â CredentialsContainer â get â identity_option â providers_option_nonce

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 5 December 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old.
